    • sauvegarder

      public static void sauvegarder​(Partie p, java.lang.String nomDuFichier)
      Save a Partie
      It use the java tools to save in byte code a Serializable Object.
      Parameters:
      p - The Partie to save
      nomDuFichier - The name of the output File (It will be place in REP/nomDuFichier.save)

    • charger

      public static Partie charger​(java.lang.String nomDuFichier)
      Load a Partie
      It use the java tools to load in byte code a Serializable Object.
      Parameters:
      nomDuFichier - The name of the input File (File will be REP/nomDuFichier.save)

    • listSave

      public static java.lang.String[] listSave()
      make a list with all save in a [] and return it.
      return An array of every file aviable in REPSAVE sort in non-ascending order.
